name: Tom's Scrambled Egg Sandwich
author: historiker
summary: My dad came up with this recipe years ago. Over the years, everyone I have shared this with always reacts the same way. First, they tell me 'that sounds awful!' After they eat it their story changes to 'that was amazing!' I know the idea of mayo and mustard on a scrambled egg disk sounds odd, but trust me; you'll love it. I know the cooking method for the eggs may be sacrilege for some folks; I just ask that you try it before changing it up.
directions: Beat eggs, milk, and salt together in a bowl
Heat a small nonstick skillet over medium heat
Cook eggs in hot skillet without stirring until set on the bottom, about 1 1/2 minutes
Flip eggs and cook without stirring until set on the other side, about 1 minute more
Spread 1 tablespoon of mayonnaise on each piece of toast
Spread mustard over mayonnaise onto each piece of toast
Place eggs on one piece of toast and top with remaining toast
